A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was totally excited to see this with my dad because we have seen all of them at the theater since the phantom menace. We were so depressed walking out tonight. We both didn't understand the story\, it didn't seem like a Star Wars movie. Dumb jokes\, if the characters aren't going to take it seriously why should I? Luke wasn't a hero anymore? Why? I don't get it.
